name: Cannon Fodder [WIP]
description:
--- Cannon Fodder ---

Embry-Riddle Game Development Club: Armed Forces Jam 2022 Submission

Engage in an action-strategy 2v2 military simulator. One player works a VR mortar while the other player scouts the battlefield with a drone. In this procedurally generated warzone, each team is rigorously trying to escort its army of tanks to the enemy's trenches while simultaneously destroying oncoming enemy tanks. Information is key! The drone player must accurately inform the man on the mortar of the location of enemy resources in order to claim victory! This game's purpose to highlight the power of clear communication between your team during the heat of battle. The more efficiently information is able to travel, the more effective the army can act!

Challenges: RTS
